file_insights.description: Added 'inspection' module to the import statement from app.models
file_insights.context: Alembic configuration file that defines database migration environment settings
file_insights.impact: Enables the inspection model to be available during database migrations, likely needed for proper schema handling

patterns_discovered.description: Multiple models are imported from app.models on a single line, maintaining clean separation of concerns
patterns_discovered.significance: Allows Alembic to access all necessary model definitions during migration operations

patterns_discovered.description: Models are added to the import list as they are created or needed in the application
patterns_discovered.significance: Suggests an iterative development approach where models are registered on-demand

gotchas_discovered.description: All models referenced in migration files or metadata operations must be explicitly imported in env.py
gotchas_discovered.impact: Forgetting to import a new model could cause migrations to fail or not properly reflect schema changes

gotchas_discovered.description: When adding models to the import list, the order and format must remain consistent with existing imports
gotchas_discovered.impact: Inconsistent formatting could make future imports harder to parse or maintain

approach_outcome.description: Successfully added 'inspection' module to the app.models import statement in alembic/env.py on the first attempt

recommendations.recommendation: Consider documenting which models require alembic env.py imports vs. which are automatically discovered
recommendations.rationale: Would prevent missed imports in future model additions

recommendations.recommendation: Run alembic migration checks after adding new model imports to verify they are properly accessible
recommendations.rationale: Ensures the import addition actually resolves any migration-related issues

recommendations.recommendation: Consider using wildcard imports or a dynamic import loader if the model list continues to grow
recommendations.rationale: Current approach is maintainable for small-to-medium model counts, but could become unwieldy with significant growth
